attributes.action: use his influence to secure a debate in Government time on a motion of no confidence in Speaker Martin.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On 18 May 2009, following a statement and in response to several points of order, Speaker Martin stated that in order for a debate to take place on the motion put by the Member for Harwich and Clacton expressing no confidence in him, the government would be required to allot time for such a debate to take place. This petition calls upon the Prime Minister to use his influence in the Government to secure such a debate.

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
